Name: Unroaded
About the game: After death, there is no memory, no feelings. Found himself at unroaded lands, the vagrant was forced to choose directions. And with that to make decisions about who he should be now. Unroaded is a short free visual novel (interactive text-based story) with a dark setting. The plot expands in a half-dead world and is complemented by moral choices that will determine your ending.
